entry.title: Combined summary - Fee estimation requirements
entry.summary: A Bitcoin user named Dave has submitted a query on Github regarding the current process of estimating fees. He argues that the software requires waiting for a couple of blocks after being synced before fee estimation will work, which he believes is not necessary and could be improved upon. Dave frequently estimates fees but relies on block explorers to report on the most recent blocks.According to Dave, once the software is synced, it doesn't need to trust anything. He suggests that if this is a matter of priorities, it should be mentioned. This query may prompt developers to consider revising the software to make it more efficient for users like Dave who require frequent fee estimations.
